programme.desc: Alitt, seorang pengarang terlaris, yang sentiasa disokong oleh teman wanitanya, Wina. Namun, hubungan mereka terjalin kerana Wina akur dengan permintaan ibunya. Sehingga akhirnya Alitt bertemu dengan Vivi.

programme.title: Jasmine
programme.desc: Gerak manja Jasmine menyayangi dirinya membuatkan hati Zaman berdetik mencintai Jasmine. Sayang telah bertukar menjadi cinta tanpa dipinta. Untuk itu, walaupun diusia 33 tahun, Zaman masih sendiri. Hati Zaman terguris kala Jasmine menyatakan cintanya pada lelaki lain. Awal segala-gala pada Jasmine kerana Awal cinta pertamanya.

programme.title: Playboy Dimindaku
programme.desc: Farid mempunyai banyak personaliti dan kekasih. Dia menggunakan personalitinya untuk berdepan dengan masalah dengan cara membiarkan personalitinya yang lain mengambil alih kekosongan yang dia tinggalkan itu.

programme.title: From London To Bali
programme.desc: Krisya yang telah jatuh cinta terhadap seorang jejaka bernama Irfan. Bagaimanapun cintanya ditolak kerana Irfan lebih tertarik kepada wanita `berisi`. Oleh itu, Krisya kini nekad untuk menaikkan badannya demi jejaka impiannya.

programme.title: Kesabaran Bocah Yang Merawat Ibunya Sendirian Berbuah Kebahagiaan
programme.desc: Pada usia yang masih kecil, Alif terpaksa menjadi dewasa disebabkan masalah yang berlaku dengan kedua ibu bapanya. Dengan kesabaran dan keikhlasan yang besar, Alif menjaga ibunya seorang diri.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep160
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep3
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep44
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep124
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep166
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Kurang Perhatian, Hanya Alasan Suamiku Puber Kedua
programme.desc: Kerana dituduh terlalu sibuk dengan perniagaan klinik miliknya, Della kelihatan menerima perlakuan yang tidak menyenangkan daripada suaminya, Fahmi. Merasa diabaikan, Fahmi sanggup berselingkuh dengan wanita lain.

programme.title: Pelangi Untuk Nirmala Ep1
programme.desc: Persahabatan antara dua orang gadis, Pelangi dan Nirmala. Namun, persahabatan mereka ditentang oleh orang tua mereka kerana perbezaan strata sosial. Pelangi hidup dengan sederhana, sementara Nirmala hidup mewah.

programme.title: Bisik Sore Ep7
programme.desc: Pembawa acara menyajikan berita-berita dan perkembangan terbaru dari sejumlah kasus yang menimpa sejumlah tokoh terkenal di Indonesia.

programme.title: Golden Memories Asia Ep52
programme.desc: Golden Memories Asia merupakan acara pencarian bakat untuk menyanyikan lagu-lagu nostalgia atau lagu lama dari tahun 1970-an hingga 2000-an, dihadiri oleh enam negara Asia Tenggara iaitu Brunei Darussalam, Indonesia, Malaysia, Filipina, Singapura, dan Timor Leste. Program ini adalah untuk memupuk kegembiraan dan keseronokan, serta satu bentuk persahabatan antara negara.

programme.title: Kurang Perhatian, Hanya Alasan Suamiku Puber Kedua
programme.desc: Kerana dituduh terlalu sibuk dengan perniagaan klinik miliknya, Della kelihatan menerima perlakuan yang tidak menyenangkan daripada suaminya, Fahmi. Merasa diabaikan, Fahmi sanggup berselingkuh dengan wanita lain.

programme.title: Detik-Detik Terakhir
programme.desc: Rangga disahkan menghidap kanser oleh doktor dan tidak mempunyai umur yang panjang. Hancur hati ibu dan Rian sebagai adik mendengarnya. Rangga yang berputus asa untuk hidup, bangkit kembali apabila bertemu dengan seorang gadis baik bernama Luna yang juga merupakan teman wanita Rian yang tidak pernah diperkenalkan kepada keluarganya walaupun sudah lama bercinta.

programme.title: Pacarable Sekali Kamu Kang Jahit
programme.desc: Walaupun bercelaru dan menjengkelkan, namun ada sisi baik Sultan yang membuatkan Luna berdecit. Biarpun setiap hari terpaksa berjumpa Ibrahim yang nakal di butik, Luna tetap bersabar kerana terpaksa membayar hutangnya. Melihatkan kerja keras Luna, Ibrahim boleh cair juga. Tetapi kenapa Luna dipecat oleh Ibrahim?

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep166

programme.title: Remember You

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep9798
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1836
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1048
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3384
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Wonder Woman(M) Ep2627
programme.desc: Be a "shark", if you're a woman, to survive in your working and personal relationship? DU,AI-SHA, also known as Shark, is aggressive and ruthless YI,FEI-YANG nickname is "Orca". Orcas kills sharks. That implies the relationship between them. They are friends and foes at the same time. They show no mercy and never surrender. Love comes and goes but friendship lasts forever. AI-SHA doesn't want to lose her best friend YI,FEI-YANG. She doesn't need love, but she needs him.

programme.title: Player in Kaohsiung (M) Ep4748
programme.desc:
The name Kaohsiung has entered into a century of history since it has been renamed from Da Gou. This year, the National Day fireworks will be held again in Kaohsiung after 20 years passed. SETI has specially produced a new travelogue for Kaohsiung, leading the audience to visit the most popular, charming, and unique places in Kaohsiung. Through the lens, the century-old glory of Kaohsiungs [One-Hundred] is presented profoundly.
The new season of "Player in Kaohsiung" invites many hosts and celebrities, including Yao Yao, Chang Chin Lan, Daniel Chen, David Wu, Ada Chang, Fay Wu, and Kua Kua, visit the 38 administrative districts of Kaohsiung to explore the sensational stories of the people in the alleys, deeply explore the professional spirit of the Greater Kaohsiung area, the traditions and customs of the aboriginal people, the living beside the farms and ports, and the humanism nurtured by Kaohsiungs century-old history.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep108
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1048
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Battle Tour(M) Ep11
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep855856
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep683
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep459
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Young Days No Fears(M) Ep5859
programme.desc: The six girls, as good friends, have gone through their difficulties and crises in relationship, at work, and in their marriage together. Despite many challenges in life, they are not afraid. They have got each others back.

programme.title: Horseplay
programme.desc: Ha Mui goes to London to track down an art thief, Nine-Tailed Fox, who is interested in a pottery horse from the Tang Dynasty. Cheung Ho is a cop who chases after Nine-Tailed Fox since he escaped years ago. The trio must work together to gain the pottery, with Nine-Tailed Fox being hunted by his rivals at the same time.

programme.title: Keep Rolling
programme.desc: Directorial debut of Man Lim Chung, who spent 3 years filming this documentary about the life and filmmaking philosophy of Ann Hui, one of Hong Kongs greatest filmmakers. It traces Huis life story and her 40-year careers ups and downs using film footages, candid conversations with Hui, and interviews with her collaborators, family and friends.

programme.title: Marrying Mr Perfect
programme.desc: Winnie is dumped by her boyfriend in her late twenties and unknowingly meets Koo, a ruthless tycoon in business and a playboy. Koo temporarily switches identities with his driver for security reason and falls for Winnie as she is the first girl to love him for who he is. What will happen when Winnie know Koos real identity?

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: Due to the negligence of sharp-tongued barrister Adrian, his innocent client is convicted of murder and sentenced to 17 years in jail. An opportunity to appeal the case and free his client arises a few years later, but in order to right his wrong, he must fight against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong for justice to prevail.

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: Seobok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a secret mission to escort the first human clone, Seobok, to a safe place. Seobok, who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity, explores the outside world with Ki Hun for the first time but they are both chased and claimed as terrorists by CIA. How can Ki Hun protect Seobok from danger?

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: Tears of No Regret
programme.desc: Monkey King is bewitched and harmed by an evil spirit, who is none other than goddess Lucky Star in its previous life, whom Monkey King knows 300 years ago. He decides to travel back in time to find out what happened

programme.title: Secret Diary of a Mom To Be, The
programme.desc: A high-flying PR manager and her loving husband swear by a childless lifestyle but she is shocked to learn that she is expecting just when things look bright for a promotion! How would they deal with the unexpected surprises that life throws in their way?

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Mr McDreamy
programme.desc: A second generation rich man squanders his parents money and calls himself Mr McDreamy. When his parents finally have enough and cut him off financially, he establishes a Mr McDreamy Training Academy using various unconventional means to transform his four recruits into Mr McDreamies with hilarious results.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: In 2004, 10 months after the murder of Yan, Ming is transferred to do menial police work. Meanwhile, a new star Wing has emerged in the police force. Ming suspects he is also a mole sent by the triad. Determined to start anew, Ming must kill Wing while ensuring that his own identity does not get exposed.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of The Way We Dance features the plight of Hong Kongs grassroots performing artists as they fight against the governments plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: The Rise of Hero
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung studies hard for an exam in Guangzhou to win a chance to study abroad. However, Eunuch Hai plans to abort the overseas project and this conflict evolves into a real fight. Wong finally defeats Hai on his own and ensure the smooth continuation of the Study Abroad Campaign.

programme.title: A House of Happiness
programme.desc: Uncle Shui suffers from Alzheimer's disease but still remembers his son and late wife. His caregiver Ha Gu leaves him as she cannot stand his bad temper. He then falls in love with a woman who looks like his late wife but has a hidden agenda. His neighbours try to seek help from Ha Gu and Shuis son to make Shui see the truth about the newcomer.

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: A group of former mercenaries reunite to plan an epic heist: boosting a truckload of medicine held by a foreign intelligence agency to supply a refugee camp in need. When they find the truck is filled with stolen gold however, they realize they have been double-crossed by one of their own and putting the situation right will be an all-out war.

programme.title: Everything Under Control
programme.desc: During a diamond heist, one of the security escorts, Jelly, steals the diamonds and flees. Fellow security escorts, Yau Shing and Penguin, are forced to help the robber track down the diamonds. They stumble onto a remote village along the way, encountering strange villagers and mysterious incidents. Can they finally locate Jelly and the diamonds?

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: Paws-Men
programme.desc: When a dog is in need of rescue, the Paws-Men assemble to save the dog like Batman. Paws-Men tells the story of four men rescuing dogs and the many difficulties that they encounter, from a dog eatery to bullies and a dog abusing granny. Despite the hardships, Paws-Men give us a peek into the true friendships between dogs and humans.

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Chois actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: Kowloon Walled City
programme.desc: Neng was a street fighter in Northeast China but decides to start a new life in Hong Kongs Kowloon Walled City. Unfortunately, he is implicated in the fights and conspiracies among the triad forces. When his good friend is hunted down by the triad, Neng must team up with the residents of Kowloon Walled City to fight back and save his friend.

programme.title: Eternal Wave
programme.desc: Lin Xiang is a spy trying to rebuild an underground informant network in Shanghai after the Japanese Occupation. He meets a simple but righteous girl who acts as his wife in the secret mission. When Lin is captured after his identity was revealed, his wife comes to save him but can they escape from the foes?

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Xiao Rus financial analysis for a bank client was stolen online. A ransom has to be paid within three days or else the document would be disclosed. To protect the clients data, the company brings in the police to investigate. In the meantime, an analyst disappears and the Technical Director resigns. Is there a bigger crisis lurking behind?

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Polices Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: Lost Love
programme.desc: Mei tries to get over the death of her young son by becoming a foster parent. For 13 years, Meis dedication to the foster child leads her to neglect her husband and the true needs of the child. It is only through the childs unintentional help that the couple finally manages to salvage their relationship.

programme.title: Love · Revolution
programme.desc: Ai Yoshida will do anything for love, including traveling to Thailand with her boyfriend from Japan to run dope. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the local gangster after a brawl at a bar, Ai sets out on a rescue mission that sends her on an action-packed roller-coaster ride where she meets a professional assassin who breaks out of jail for love.

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quins trust, Nick becomes his protg and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: The Sunny Side of the Street
programme.desc: Hassan is a Pakistani refugee boy whose father has died in a car accident. A local taxi driver, Yat, then helps him flee Hong Kong. In the process, the two gradually develop a father-son relationship, until Hassan discovers the shocking truth about his fathers death

programme.title: The Blue And The Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: Gambler'S Delight
programme.desc: The Killer star Danny Lee plays the lead role of a guy who needs to become a hero. He lies, steals and cheats his way into operating a plush casino, but when he incurs the wrath of a female Japanese gang leader, all bets are off!

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: David Chiang plays the all-new one-armed hero - a man who chops off his right arm rather than live with dishonor. When the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend is murdered by the evil gang, it is time to battle.

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: Men From The Monastery
programme.desc: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Wu San Gui betrays his people to the Qing officials and recruits fighters from all backgrounds. Members from Wudan and Ermei are the first to yield and collude with local bullies. When they start attacking the Shaolin Monastery, its most famous disciples have to band together and fight against the enemies.

programme.title: The House Of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: Clan Feuds
programme.desc: Like legendary director Chu Yuan did so often and so successfully, Chang Peng Yi adapted this film from a story by Ku Lung. Following the footsteps of the equally legendary Chang Cheh, Chang also casted the majestic Ti Lung, along with "Venoms Lo Meng and Sun Chien, for a spectacular showcase of mystical Martial Arts Worlds intrigue and consummate Kung Fu.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: Swordswomen Three
programme.desc: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon could be called "Swordswomen Two." Three decades earlier, Shen Yi, Essie Lin Chia, and Pan Ying-tzu took on Shaw's first international superstar, Lo Lieh for the Han Family Sword - making this a four-star treat for action fans.

programme.title: The Blue And The Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return

programme.title: Crazy Nuts Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: A roadside bandit and a traveling gambler team up to make money from gambling. In a successful attempt to steal a huge amount of money from a warlords home, they encounter revolutionists who seek their help to fund the reform campaign. Will the two help the revolutionists cause with the stolen money?

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: The Singing Thief
programme.desc: A master jewel thief turns over a new leaf as a professional singer in a nightclub. However, a series of robberies happened shortly after and he becomes the suspect again. The thief then sets up a trap to snare the copycat but will this backfire on him?

programme.title: Return Of The Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: Ghosts Galore
programme.desc: Young Taoist priest Lu and his friend are nearly killed by a female ghost during an exorcism. Luckily, Master Lian saves their lives, so they beseech him to teach them his skills. When his friend is killed by ruthless ninjas, Lu decides to learn the ultimate witchcraft and teams up with his master to defeat them.

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her fathers towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: Heroes Of The East
programme.desc: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her that is misinterpreted by the others. He must then prove how good Chinese Kung Fu really is through a series of duels with the seven Japanese martial artists who come to meet the challenge!

programme.title: Between Tears And Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The Generals henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Celebrated scriptwriter Shen Chiang (Heroes of Sung) continues to spread his magic touch to directing with this tale surrounding the end of the Song dynasty. Threatened by the Yuan who are closing in to rule the whole of China, a band of Song survivors band together to save their prime minister. This bold and fearless heroes fighting for their cause are led by international star, Lo Lieh (Glass Tears, Killer Clans) and Shi Szu ( Lovers Destiny), who must fight their way out of trap after trap. But they can't escape them all, and eventually the two end up in prison... it is either death or a fight to the end!

programme.title: Asia-Pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parents consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Young carriage driver Kin offends the gangsters by saving a young girl. His boss immediately fires him to avoid getting into trouble. Since then, Kin is determined to protect the weak and learns the Tsai Li Fu style of martial arts from a Shaolin master to challenge the gangsters, finally beating them.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperors death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Secret Service Of The Imperial Court
programme.desc: Zhao Bu Fan is the sergeant of the governments secret police. Wang is a cruel and ruthless eunuch who takes over the Emperors ruling power and leads the team of secret agents. After witnessing the atrocities committed by Eunuch Wang, Sergeant Zhao decides to defect but ends up being hunted by his friends, comrades and even his father.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: The 36Th Chamber Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Gordon Liu plays an anti-Manchu rebel who escapes to the Shaolin Temple and learns what it truly takes to become a martial arts master by challenging the 35 Shaolin Kung Fu chambers, eventually creating the 36th chamber himself.

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: Angel With The Iron Fists
programme.desc: Lo Wei directs and stars as the chief detective in this gripping thriller; playing alongside Lily Ho, who excels in the role of an undercover avenger that can fight as well as she flirts! Caught between the crime bosses known as Baldhead and Black Widow, she only has four choices: punch, kick, shoot or bombard with explosives!

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Shaolin Intruders
programme.desc: A rare directorial foray for acclaimed martial arts choreographer Tang Chia, Shaolin Intruders is an entertaining amalgamation of eye-popping martial arts and thrilling detective story. On a routine courier mission, the prestigious Chin Hu Chief was murdered by four mysterious monks. When all evidence pointed to Ching Hua (Liu Yu-po) his friend Lei Hsin (Derek Yee) was determined to clear his name by barging in the Shaolin Temple thrice. When Lei thought justice was served for the culprits, he soon realized the table had turned and the monks stroke again. What followed is a series of intense pursuit for the ultimate villainThe film is filled with jaw-dropping action sequences developed by Tang and six leading choreographers of the era. Scenes including the "Blade Array", "Twelve Vajrayana Array" and the acclaimed "Stool Array" are all lauded as the defining Chinese screen gems, for their insane complexity and lightning speed.

programme.title: The Story Of Sue San
programme.desc: TIn this Huangmei Opera romance, Wang is the son of a respected government official whereas Sue San is a famous prostitute. Although they love each other and seem to be perfectly matched, the two are worlds apart when it comes to social ranking, which will prove hard to overcome...

programme.desc: Koch, a young Englishman teacher, tries to change a strict German boys schools archaic ways and prejudiced views of the English with unconventional methods. A battle ensues between his detractors who want him out and his students who adore him.

programme.title: Heart Of A Lion
programme.desc: Teppo, the leader of a gang of neo-nazis, falls in love with Sari. To his shock, Saris son is black, and Teppo finds his prejudices and loyalties pitted against his desire for love and family.

programme.title: Indian Horse
programme.desc: Saul Indian Horse is an indigenous man who was forcefully removed from his family when he was a young boy. Placed in a strict boarding school, he struggles to find peace with his life. He eventually finds salvation in the unlikeliest of places hockey.

programme.title: Far Frontiers
programme.desc: Maria, wife of a deputy commander of a Russian military base in Kyrgyzstan, begins a relationship with another officer. Their affair quickly spirals out of control, fatally and irreversibly changing the course of Maria's and her family's life.

programme.title: Nightfall In India
programme.desc: In the 60s, Ricardo would facilitate overland travel from Europe to India for hippies. Now, hes in the last stages of a degenerative disease. For his epic final journey, he sets off on the same route with his housekeeper and a hopeful spirit.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Fourth Woman
programme.desc: The body of a woman is found in a hops field suspended like in a spider web, and a swimmer is later run over by a motorboat on the lake. Two police officers are sent to investigate the case and they uncover how the two deaths might be related.

programme.title: Jirga
programme.desc: In this bracingly raw film about vindication and grace, an Australian ex-soldier goes to Afghanistan to seek absolution from the family of a civilian he had killed in the war. And it will be the 10 year old son of the deceased who will decide his fate.

programme.title: The Little Comrade
programme.desc: During Stalinist tyranny, 6-year-old Leelos mother is sent to a prison camp. Haunted by her mothers last words telling her to be a good kid, Leelo vows to be on her best behaviour in the hope that it will bring her mother back.

programme.title: Lessons of a Dream
programme.desc: Koch, a young Englishman teacher, tries to change a strict German boys schools archaic ways and prejudiced views of the English with unconventional methods. A battle ensues between his detractors who want him out and his students who adore him.

programme.title: Storm Warning
programme.desc: During a ferocious storm, two teenagers lose sight of the 10-year-old boy theyre babysitting and he disappears never to be found. 20 years later, the news of the murder of their high-school teacher forces them to confront their traumas and old wounds.

programme.title: Heart Of A Lion
programme.desc: Teppo, the leader of a gang of neo-nazis, falls in love with Sari. To his shock, Saris son is black, and Teppo finds his prejudices and loyalties pitted against his desire for love and family.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - Death In The Forest

programme.title: Indian Horse

programme.title: Rites of Passage
programme.desc: Faced with the prospect of having to kill a chicken he had cared for since childhood in a family ritual, Anwar has to come up with a scheme to avoid killing his beloved pet.

programme.title: The Broken Glass Theory
programme.desc: Insurance claims investigator Claudio finds himself in a never-ending nightmare in a small town. For what seemed like a simple job, Claudio's task now involves racing against the clock to discover the identity of the worst serial arsonist he has yet seen.

programme.title: Eight Legged Freaks
programme.desc: What do you get when you cross toxic waste with a bunch of exotic spiders?.. Eaten!.. The residents of a rural mining town discover that an unfortunate chemical spill has caused hundreds of little spiders to mutate overnight to the size of SUVs. And their hungry! When the alarm is sounded, it's then up to mining engineer Chris McCormack and Sheriff Sam Parker to mobilize an eclectic group of townspeople, including the Sheriff's young son, Mike, her daughter, Ashley and paranoid radio announcer Harlan Griffith and Deputy Pete Willis into battle against the bloodthirsty eight-legged beasts.

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: Two days before his wedding, Doug drives to Las Vegas with his best buddies Phil and Stu and his future brother-in-law Alan, for a blow-out bachelor party they vow they'll never forget. But when the three groomsmen wake up the next morning with pounding headaches, they can't remember a thing. Their luxury hotel suite is beyond trashed and the groom is nowhere to be found. With no clue about what happened and little time to spare, the trio must attempt to retrace their bad decisions from the night before in order to figure out where things went wrong in the hopes of finding Doug and getting him back to L.A. in time for his wedding. But the more they begin to uncover, the more they realize just how much trouble they're really in.

programme.title: In The Heart Of The Sea
programme.desc: Oscar winner Ron Howard (A Beautiful Mind) directs the action adventure based on the best-selling book about the dramatic true journey of the whaling ship Essex. In the winter of 1820, the New England whaling vessel Essex was assaulted by something no one could believe: a whale of mammoth size and will, and an almost human sense of vengeance. The real-life maritime disaster would inspire Herman Melville's Moby Dick. But that told only half the story. In The Heart of The Sea reveals the encounter's harrowing aftermath, as the ship's surviving crew is pushed to their limits and forced to do the unthinkable to stay alive. Braving storms, starvation, panic and despair, the men will call into question their deepest beliefs, from the value of their lives to the morality of their trade, as their captain searches for direction on the open sea and his first mate (The Avengers' Chris Hemsworth) still seeks to bring the great whale down.

programme.title: Going In Style (2017)
programme.desc: Oscar winners Morgan Freeman, Michael Caine and Alan Arkin team up as lifelong buddies Willie, Joe and Al, who decide to buck retirement and step off the straight-and-narrow for the first time in their lives when their pension fund becomes a corporate casualty, in director Zach Braff's comedy Going In Style. Desperate to pay the bills and come through for their loved ones, the three risk it all by embarking on a daring bid to knock off the very bank that absconded with their money.

programme.title: Flags Of Our Fathers
programme.desc: Filmmaking legends Steven Spielberg and Clint Eastwood team up for the first time to tell the unforgettable story of the grueling World War II battle for the island of Iwo Jima -- a turning point in the war for control over the Pacific. The battle produced one of the war's most enduring images: a photograph of six U.S. Marines raising an American flag on the top of Mt. Suribachi. Multiple Academy Award winner Eastwood directs a powerful all-star ensemble including Paul Walker, Ryan Phillippe, Adam Beach, Jamie Bell, Barry Pepper, Neal McDonough and more in this tragic depiction of an epic struggle that would cost the lives of thousands of Japanese and American soldiers.

programme.desc: Vegan Sausages - Gregg Wallace visits a Yorkshire team that churn out up to 90,000 vegan sausages a day! Historian Ruth Goodman uncovers the green shoots of the vegetarian movement in Britain.

programme.desc: The Milky Way: Island of Light - Professor Brian Cox journeys across the vastness of time and space.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lean on Me - Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Strength in Sisterhood - The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomads brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Magicians of the Reef - Arabias coral reefs are home to some of natures most impressive illusionists. Creatures can pulsate with colour, transform in the blink of an eye, or perform riveting displays of showmanship. Because in these dangerous waters, disguise is crucial.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snares Islands/ Tini Heke - Venture to the pristine wilderness of the Snares Islands, a remote animal sanctuary protected from the turbulent sea. Hop along with a colony of Snares crested penguins, soar with giant petrels and sooty shearwaters, and roar with giant sea lions.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko - Set sail for New Zealands Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Ocean Oddballs - Dive into the lives of the oceans weirdest animals. Looking into a whitemargin stargazer fishs eyes can be a shocking experience (literally), while predators hoping to take down a peacock mantis shrimp will be stopped by its vice-like claws.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rebuilding an Empire - Over the course of recorded time, many species have been threatened with extinction. Once-powerful animal empires like the dinosaurs - have been completely wiped from the planet. But others once on the verge of disappearance have survived, bounced back, and even reclaimed their kingdoms.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Wetland Wonder - Southern Africa is gripped in a punishing drought. Across the region plants and animals are suffering. At times like this water becomes critical survival and wetlands become magnets for life. This film is a celebration of South Africas greatest wetland Lake St Lucia.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Wild Education - Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lean on Me - Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Strength in Sisterhood - The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomads brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Magicians of the Reef - Arabias coral reefs are home to some of natures most impressive illusionists. Creatures can pulsate with colour, transform in the blink of an eye, or perform riveting displays of showmanship. Because in these dangerous waters, disguise is crucial.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snares Islands/ Tini Heke - Venture to the pristine wilderness of the Snares Islands, a remote animal sanctuary protected from the turbulent sea. Hop along with a colony of Snares crested penguins, soar with giant petrels and sooty shearwaters, and roar with giant sea lions.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko - Set sail for New Zealands Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rebuilding an Empire - Over the course of recorded time, many species have been threatened with extinction. Once-powerful animal empires like the dinosaurs - have been completely wiped from the planet. But others once on the verge of disappearance have survived, bounced back, and even reclaimed their kingdoms.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Anatomy Gone Wild - Evolution has granted some animals a distinct advantage over their opponents. Investigate the perfect body-part mutations that have given wunderpus octopuses, axolotls, royal spoonbills, aye-ayes, and other creatures an edge.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Wild Education - Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 Ep2

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko - Set sail for New Zealands Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Giant Creepy Crawlers - Crawl along with some of the worlds fiercest insects. Watch as giant cockroaches build their immune systems to ensure long life. Then check out the toxic prowess of giant millipedes and the invisibility cloaks of giant prickly stick insects.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Camouflage and Colouration - Hiding in plain sight helps many insect, fish, and amphibian species survive. Learn the ins and outs of an array of animal invisibility techniques, such as warning and disruptive colouration, mimicry, and active camouflage.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Geladas of Ethiopia - Geladas are only found among the peaks and plateaus of Ethiopias Simien Mountains, an ancient range of incredible beauty and biodiversity. We follow the Mountain Band of Geladas as they make their daily migration from the cliff edge to the mountaintop.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Baboon Lagoon - Enter the wilds of South Africa to get an intimate look into one of the continents most misunderstood primates. Like humans, these primates have unique personalities and share strong bonds with their families and friends.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Africa's Baboons - The baboon is one of the worlds most successful and dominant primates. Ranging throughout Africa, we explore how these fascinating animals have adapted to thrive in mountains, deserts, along the shores of acidic lakes, and even on the edge of a mighty ocean.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Zanzibar's Poison Monkey - Off the coast of Tanzania, baby Kima lives with his family of red Colobus monkeys. But what happens when he loses his way? Discover how this little monkey learns to adapt to life in the jungleand find out if he can reconnect with his family again.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Realm of the Bear - Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Realm of the Wolf - In the remote wilderness of the Carpathian Mountains lives an elusive predator that has inspired awe and fear throughout history: the Eurasian wolf. Discover the vital role that these once-misunderstood hunters play in protecting their ecosystem.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Punks on the Run - The lions of the Nomad pride rampage deep into the heart of the MK prides territory, scattering its members and coming dangerously close to the five new MK cubs. Meanwhile, the Hollywoods are recovering, and Avas survival skills are still intact.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Punks Strike Back - After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Hollywoods Held Hostage - During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Next Dynasty - The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.desc: Giant Creepy Crawlers - Crawl along with some of the worlds fiercest insects. Watch as giant cockroaches build their immune systems to ensure long life. Then check out the toxic prowess of giant millipedes and the invisibility cloaks of giant prickly stick insects.

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Deserts - Behind the facade of Australias dramatic scenery is a motley crew of silent assassins, con artists, gang members and brutal brawlers, vying for supremacy amidst the harsh, dry and desolate Australian desert. Competition for resources is so fierce, its animal residents have developed some ingenious methods of survival.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Camouflage and Colouration - Hiding in plain sight helps many insect, fish, and amphibian species survive. Learn the ins and outs of an array of animal invisibility techniques, such as warning and disruptive colouration, mimicry, and active camouflage.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Realm of the Bear - Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Punks Strike Back - After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Hollywoods Held Hostage - During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Next Dynasty - The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Isle Royale - Since the 1900s, this uninhabited island in Lake Superior has been a constant battleground between moose and wolves. Scientists have been watching closely since 1953, making it one of the oldest research projects in the country. We go with lead researcher Rolf Peterson as he gets a band of volunteers to scour the island for moose bones, trying to piece together population numbers after a long winter.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Invaders from the Deep - As far as invasive species go, Asian carp are some of the nastiest invaders around. They've thus far made their way up America's waterways, snaking up the Illinois river, eating voraciously, breeding quickly, and decimating native fish populations and their food supplies.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Cat Country - In many countries the vulnerable and elusive ocelot is on the Endangered Species List. But on the southern edge of the Pantanal, one of the worlds largest tropical wetlands, this magnificent wild cat seems to be making a comeback. A team of young wildlife scientists is trying to understand why.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Amazon Monkeys - In a protected forest on the southern edge of Brazils Amazon Rainforest, lives one of the most intelligent and agile monkeys of the New World - the white-whiskered spider monkey. Their long tails are like a 5th limb and they rarely leave the treetops for the forest floor. They are the ambassadors of their forest.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Capybara's Pond - At the northern edge of the Pantanal, in one of the largest tropical wetlands on Earth, is a small pond that is home to an unusual family of rodents. They are not your typical rats or squirrels - these giants are the size of sheep! And in the middle of the dry season, this group has more than a dozen babies to raise and keep safe. It is a challenge because as big as they are, these gentle giants are on the menu of lots of predators.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Rheas-Cerrado - Every year in the dry season, as the floodwaters disappear, the grasslands of the Pantanal are home to many species: giant anteaters, maned wolves and the greater rheas- the largest bird in South America.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Karst Caves - Squeezed between South East Asias two most formidable geographical barriers - the Annamite mountains and the Mekong river, lies Khammouane a rugged karst landscape, honeycombed with countless caves. These caves were formed by water flowing down towards the Mekong.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Nature's Crossroads - Thailand is a place of a thousand landscapes, dominated by lush forests, rolling hills and extensive rivers systems that feed into the mighty Mekong. Here the Mekong river continues its journey down the Eastern border, winding its way through biological and geological crossroads, sculpting the landscape and the lives of the creatures that live there.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Thailand: the River Basin - Although the Mekong runs down Thailands far eastern border, the influence of the rivers basin reaches across nearly half the country. The east of Thailand is characterized by a complex network of the Mekongs tributaries. These waterways are the foundation of life for many different ecosystems; from extensive rice fields to large pockets of tropical rainforest.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Cambodia: Hidden Refuges - Cambodia is a country that lies almost entirely within the Mekong basin, flanked by Thailand, Laos and Vietnam. The Mekong travels the length of the country entering in the north and tracking south, cutting the region into two halves. Every habitat here is somehow linked to the Mekongs waters. Whether it be its tributaries which connect and traverse much of the countries terrain, or the seasonal flooding that influences landscapes miles beyond its reach.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Island Feast - Off the coast of Oman, summer weather drives nutrients in from the ocean depths where they meet the Arabian sun, causing an explosion of life. Smaller fish spawn, filling the waters with eggs. This creates a buffet predators just cant resist.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Defenders of the Reef - Its summer in the Gulf of Oman. The scorching Arabian sun heats the shallow waters to 86 degrees boosting the growth of algae across a vast coral reef. This attracts thousands of hungry herbivores creating a fish versus fish turf war.

programme.title: HD Hits!
programme.desc: We've got big hits and they're even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: Global Beats!
programme.desc: Tune in for a selection of the biggest Hip-Hop, R&B, K-Pop and Reggaeton beats that are taking over the world!

programme.title: Sampled
programme.desc: Bas and some of his "Dreamville" crew, The Fiends, land for a long layover in Medellin after a 30-hour journey from his show in Latvia. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: Sampled
programme.desc: Rapper Goldlink heads to Berlin for his first show in two years. Local journalist Cloudy Zackrocki shows him an unexpected side to the city as they explore its culture of transformation. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: MTV Family Legacy
programme.desc: ... & Diddy. With exclusive footage and brand-new interviews with the children of our favourite music stars, MTV's Family Legacy gives fans a fresh take on some of MTV's celebrated events. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: Hip Hop My House
programme.desc: Cam'ron and Zeez visit K-Town, Los Angeles, to meet Rae Sremmurd superfan Akkaraj (AK). AK is a hyper-creative who needs his lackluster 1-bedroom apartment to serve multiple functions. (S1, ep1)

programme.title: Hip Hop My House
programme.desc: Cam'ron and Zeez visit Rowland Heights, California, to meet Tyga superfan Rashard. The duo transform his suburban bungalow into a Hip-Hop oasis delivering the ultimate pool party makeover. (S1, ep2)

programme.title: Hip Hop My House
programme.desc: Cam'ron and Zeez visit Carson, California, to meet Polo G superfan Deshaun. Deshaun is a student, musician and military vet who needs help imagining a creative sanctuary. (S1, ep3)

programme.title: Hip Hop My House
programme.desc: Cam'ron and Zeez visit East Hollywood, Los Angeles, to meet Migos superfan Macoia. Macoia is an east-coast transplant who has recently overcome a series of personal challenges. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: Hip Hop My House
programme.desc: Cam'ron and Zeez visit the San Fernando Valley to meet Nelly superfan Olivia. Cam'ron and Zeez use Southern inspiration and Nelly's Midwest vibe to overhaul her drab apartment. (S1, ep5)

programme.title: Hip Hop My House
programme.desc: Cam'ron and Zeez are in Hollywood to meet 24KGoldn superfan, Kelechi. A successful college grad recently out of a relationship, Kelechi needs help to level up his bland living situation. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: Hip Hop My House
programme.desc: Cam'ron and Zeez visit Compton, California, to meet Erica Banks superfan Lamanella (Lala). Lala is looking to transform her South Central home into a 'Boss Babe Bungalow'. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: Hip Hop My House
programme.desc: Cam'ron and Zeez visit Hawthorne, California, to meet A Boogie Wit Da Hoodie superfan Mariah (Yaya) whose home space does not accommodate all her needs. (S1, ep8)

programme.title: Hip Hop My House
programme.desc: Cam'ron and Zeez visit Rosemead, California, to meet Cam'ron superfan Flower. Flower is a single mother and a vegan chef whose crib has been overrun by the demands of both responsibilities. (S1, ep9)

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep79
programme.desc: Fifi's Filmshow - Fifi has decided to film an average day in Flowertot garden. Yet everybody starts acting strangely as soon as the camera appears. What will the end film look like?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep80
programme.desc: Pip And The Genie - Fifi has too much to do as usual. Stingo offers to help with some of her jobs in exchange for a pie. He then tricks Pip into believing that he has a magic lamp, and will give it to Pip if he does Fifi's jobs for him

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep81
programme.desc: Runaway Mo - Stingo is bored, he wants something exciting to do. He decides to take Mo for a spin without asking Fifi first. All goes wrong when Mo gets out of control. Can the tots stop the runaway mower?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep82
programme.desc: Stingo's Enormous Carrot - Pip is trying hard to grow some vegetables. But however hard he tries, they don't seem to get any bigger. But Stingo's vegetable patch next door appears to be doing suspiciously well.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep1
programme.desc: How Do We Make A Boat? - Jess and Horace want to play Boat Racing on the pond - but first the need work out how to make a boat! Some things are too heavy, some are too light having tried lots of options and worked out that they need something light and boat shaped, they make Mimi's paper hats into boats for their boat race. Perfect!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep2
programme.desc: How Can We All Keep Warm? - It's Willow's apple picking party today, but some of the friends just are too chilly to go. Jess tries to work out how to keep them all warm, should they cover themselves in mud just like frogs do? Should they wrap themselves up in straw? Or might running around be the trick to getting them all toasty warm?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep3
programme.desc: What's Happened To Chloe The Caterpillar? - Jess wants to introduce Willow to his new friend, Chloe the caterpillar. But where's Chloe gone? He searches for her in all the places she might be, where he's visited her before, where there might be juicey leaves she'd like to eat but it's not until a butterfly breaks out of a little Chloe-shaped-sack that Jess realises that Chloe's just changed!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep4
programme.desc: When Will My Coloured Stripes Come Back? - Jess is playing puddle jumping, dodging the rain to have fun on a gloomy day when suddenly, just as the rain's stopping, the sun comes out and at the same time he sees a beautiful rainbow in the sky. He's desperate to show his friends, and it's not until he works out you need sunshine and rain at the same time to make a rainbow that he can show his friends the beautiful coloured shape in the sky.

programme.title: Olivia Ep7
programme.desc: Olivia And Her Alien Brother - After a trip to the planetarium, Ian's knowledge about space and his peculiar behaviour lead Olivia to believe that her brother is an alien. Olivia soon discovers his secrethe's making a special gift for his favourite sister

programme.title: Olivia Ep8
programme.desc: Olivia Plants A Garden - When Mrs. Hogenmuller distributes seeds for a class garden project, Olivia just can't wait for her plants to grow. But when her dog Perry digs up her little garden, Olivia discovers something even more exciting what appears to be a dinosaur bone!

programme.title: Olivia Ep9
programme.desc: Olivia Claus - It's almost Christmas, and Olivia and Ian can't wait for Santa to come. But there's one thing that Santa can't bring Olivia's lost toy, her beloved monkey Mathilda. Olivia imagines herself to be a Santa Claus who returns lost toys. On Christmas morning Olivia finds new gifts under the tree and Mathilda right under her nose.

programme.title: Olivia Ep10
programme.desc: Olivia Takes Ballet - Olivia is determined to dance just like the ballerinas she's seen in a ballet; the only thing she needs is a partner. Luckily, Uncle Garret (a professional football player) is visiting, and the two of them dance a surprisingly graceful pas de deux for Olivia's whole class.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep1
programme.desc: Why Elephant Has A Trunk - You see there was a time when Elephant had no nose. He couldn't swat away the flies, or scrub his belly he couldn't even blow his nose. Then one day snappy Crocodile snapped! Crocodile pulled and he pulled and he pulled until Ker-doing!!! Crocodile let go and Elephant's nose was all long and wiggly! And that's why Elephant has a trunk. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep2
programme.desc: Why Snake Has No Legs - You see there was a time when Snake did have legs hundreds and hundreds of them. But poor old Snake had no eyes, not a single eye on his head. Then on the day of the great Tinga Tinga Festival of Colours Snake quite literally bumped into Millipede who was stuck in a hole. They decided to swap eyes and legs just for one day. So that Snake could see all the wonderful colours and Millipede could run all over Tinga Tinga. But when Snake came back to return Millipede's eyes, Millepede couldn't be found anywhere! So to this day, Snake has no legs. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep3
programme.desc: Why Hippo Has No Hair - You see there was a time when Hippo did have hair lots of hair! She was always harumphingly hot. Then one hot night while Hippo was sleeping a spark from the fire caught the end of her hairy tail! Hippo was on fire! She ran through the bush until SPLOSH! Hippo jumped in the waterhole. And from that day on Hippo stayed in the cool waters without a single hair on her hide. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep4
programme.desc: Why Tortoise Has A Broken Shell - You see there was a time when Tortoise's shell was all shiny and smooth. One day Tortoise discovered the birds were having a Feast in the Heavens and he tricked the Birds into making him a pair of wings. Greedy Tortoise raced the birds beyond the clouds and scoffed the whole feastt! When the Birds found out Tortoise had to jump off a cloud until BOOF!!! He landed on his shiny shell. All the animals pieced Tortoise's shell back together but from that day on Tortoise's shell was all bumpy and broken and he never moved speedily again. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep14
programme.desc: Raiders of the Lost Bark / Slow, Dog. Slow! - When Tag and Scooch break Gilbers ancient Golden Slipper, they embark on an adventure to a secret cave to retrieve the matching slipper. \ For community outreach day, the Race Cadets are paired with an elderly resident of Pawston. It's Tag and Scooch's job to take old dog Leo around town for a day of slow, relaxing activities. But when Leo wants to kickbarx, row and skydive, Tag and Scooch try their best to keep up.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep11
programme.desc: Tanaka's Moving Castle / Zenko Don't Go - Mr. Tanaka is moving places all by himself, so Team Zenko step in to assist, and learn the importance of asking people for help. / When Sam's skateboard competition falls on the same day as her favourite creator Ken KaBlam's comic book signing, TZG secretly prevents him leaving town before she gets the chance to meet him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep21
programme.desc: Plushythingy - When Frederic Estes creates the cutest plushy ever that is the hottest toy in town, the field team must destroy the last remaining one but are powerless against its cuteness

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep23
programme.desc: Picture Perfect - Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep63
programme.desc: Snuffnut - Tuff fakes his own death to make room for Throk, but when Ruff tries to train the Changewing that she thinks ate Tuff, a flock of angry Changewings come for the dragon

programme.desc: Party Monster - NotEnrique throws a house party for the Trolls of Arcadia Jim and Tobys search for a way to remove Stricklers ring takes a surprising turn.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia Ep22
programme.desc: It's About Time - The only way that Jim can remove Stricklers ring is if he stops time but he uses the time stopping artefact too soon..

programme.desc: A New Bergen-Ning / Laugh Out Cloud - Poppy throws a party to urge the Trolls and Bergens to build friendship When Troll Village has a drought Cloud Guy offers to wash away the problem after some quality time with Branch.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep7
programme.desc: Prank Day / Adventures In Dinkles-Sitting - When Branch declares himself Prank Master Poppy gets evenTaking care of Mr. Dinkles is a bit harder than expected for Securityobsessed Branch.

programme.desc: Lord Of The Fruit Flies - King Julien tries to rig an election so that Maurice becomes Mango Prime Minister but soon realizes his opponent Mort has a better shot than everyone thinks

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep23
programme.desc: Ladies Night - Khepra, leader of the Cat Council, takes Cleo, Akila and Callie on a "Ladies' Night Out" at the arcade. Cleo hates it until Khepra picks a fight with some aliens. Then at least there's kicking.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep24
programme.desc: Eyeball - Brian and Akila get trapped inside this weird planet and Brian reprograms a broken Xerx robot and basically, it's like it's their baby. They have to raise it real fast so it can save them from fire monsters and junk.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep1
programme.desc: Lucky And The Unbreakable Spirit - A wild horse Spirit and a soontobe city girl Lucky become friends in a frontier town

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep2

programme.desc: The Crood Who Knew Too Much / Scent Of A Thunk - When Thunk is so stinky he kills animals with his stench, he pretends to be a great hunter; A spider ant bite gives Grug the biggest brain in town.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep3

programme.desc: Remote Out of Control / Critter Comfort - Biggie takes Branchs superpowered remote but must return it before Branch finds outWhen Poppy builds a new home for a group of cute critters she accidentally attracts their predators.

programme.desc: The Party Games / Trolly Tales - Everyone gets excited because its time for the Trolls Annual funbased Party GamesPoppy and Branch try to convince the Troll kids that the library is fun.

programme.desc: Kung Fu Panda: Secrets Of The Masters - Po and the Furious Five go back in time to uncover the origin storiesof Gongman City's greatest heroes: Master Thundering Rhino, Master Storming Ox and Master Croc.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda Holiday Special Ep1

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep30
programme.desc: Dark Side of the Lagoon / Mr. Glittercakes - When Poppy drops DJ Sukis prized party-making possession in the lagoon, she and her friends must go on a submarine adventure to the lagoon floor in order to find it./When Branch uses an excuse to avoid going to a party- that he has plans with his friend Mr. Glittercakes- Poppy calls him out. But to both Branch and Poppys surprise, it turns out Mr. Glittercakes is real! Who is the mysterious Troll, and why has he chosen to help Branch?

programme.desc: Curse of the Monkey King - Po and the Kids take a shortcut to the boat bound for the Forbidden City, and are waylaid by a tricky monkey. Zhizhu informs Mayor Li of some distressing sounds coming from the Wellspring.

programme.desc: When Darkness Falls - On an island that will make the perfect outpost, the Dragon Riders discover its indigenous residents are a mysterious new breed of dragon.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep84
programme.desc: Pip's Pony - Pip wants a pony. He tries adapting his scooter and Violet even makes him a hobby horse. But nothing is quite right. Until Fifi points out the silver horse made out of stars in the night sky.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep85
programme.desc: Aunt Tulip's Carnival - All the tots are excited as Aunt Tulip is holding a Caribbean themed carnival. But will the weather hold long enough for them to have their celebrations?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep86
programme.desc: Storm - It is a windy day in the garden, Fifi's washing has blown away. Poppy offers to find it, but she gets caught in the storm. The other tots set out to find her and spend a wild night out in the open.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep5
programme.desc: Who Did I Hear In The Big Hollow Log? - Jess is searching for Horace by the pond but he's nowhere to be found. When he calls into a hollow log and his voice echo's back, Jess thinks it's the voice of a new friend and sets about trying to work out where the friend is. By using comparisons and clever thinking, Jess works out that it's not someone else - it's his voice bouncing off the log. It's an echo,

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep6
programme.desc: What Can We Do With Mimi's Rubbish? - Jess is off to play painting and gluing with his pink rabbit friend Mimi. He's very excited. But when he arrives Mimi's hutch is overflowing with rubbish and there's no space for their art project. Jess works out how to get the rubbish out of the hutch using recyclling re-using and re-pairing.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep7
programme.desc: Who Wants To Live In Baa's Meadow? - Baa's feeling lonely as his buddy Billie the mouse has gone off for the day. Jess goes hunting for someone to come to the meadow to live with Baa. He find a fish to live in the trough, but there's no pond weed for him to live, he tries Sammy snail but he carries his own home on his back so he doesn't need a new home, finally they realise that there are ants already living with Baa in the meadow.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep8
programme.desc: Why Are The Ants Visiting Mimi? - Mimi's painting a lovely picture at her hutch, with Jess along for a visit. Suddenly she's collapses in fits of tickly giggles, there are ants everywhere.. Mimi can't paint, tho, whilst she's being tickled and Jess works out they are here for her honey sandwiches!

programme.desc: Royal Pain - When Brittany becomes convinced she's a long lost princess she carries her new royal status a little too far.

programme.desc: Between a Rope and A Hard Place - Coach Dobkins kicks Cheesy and Theodore off the track team for being slow, but Theodore is determined to compete.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep415
programme.desc: World Day - To celebrate 'World Day' and win a trip, the Chipmunks each get a country to represent for a school presentation.
